Biographies

  • Andrew McMahon in the Wilderness biography

    Andrew McMahon In The Wilderness is the solo project of Something Corporate and Jack’s Mannequin frontman Andrew McMahon, a singer/songwriter hailing from Concord, Massachusetts, U.S born on September 3rd, 1982. He …

    Read more
  • Atlas Genius biography

    Atlas Genius (formed in 2009) is an Australian alternative/indie rock band, formed by three vegan brothers, hailing from Adelaide, South Australia.

    Read more
